item.title: 特朗普的第二任期需要股票投资者的新游戏规则
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对其标志性关税采取的反复无常的态度上周令市场大跌眼镜。投资者试图对自己的股票投资组合进行定位，以应对这种持续的不确定性，但他们发现，特朗普第一任期的那套打法帮不上什么忙。【原文：President Donald Trump’s mercurial approach to his signature tariffs whipsawed markets last week. And investors trying to position their equity portfolios to manage this ongoing uncertainty are finding the playbook from his first term offers little help.】

item.title: 关税风险笼罩东欧特朗普引发的市场反弹
item.description: 匈牙利的维克托-欧尔班被美国总统唐纳德-特朗普称赞为 "强硬 "和 "聪明"，他是希望对美国的忠诚能转化为交易和经济收益的东欧领导人之一。相反，他们可能会发现自己的金融市场无法逃脱美欧贸易战的更广泛影响。【原文：Lauded as “tough” and “smart” by President Donald Trump, Hungary’s Viktor Orban is among the eastern European leaders hoping that allegiance to the US will translate into deals and economic gains. Instead, they may find their financial markets cannot escape the wider fallout of a US-Europe trade war.】

item.title: 苹果新款 iPhone SE 将开启产品线关键的一年
item.description: 苹果公司即将推出的 iPhone SE 改版机将为其智能手机阵容拉开关键性一年的序幕。此外：公司加大了家用机器人的招聘力度，准备开设新的零售店，并扩大了订阅服务。【原文：Apple’s upcoming iPhone SE revamp will kick off a pivotal year for its smartphone lineup. Also: The company ramps up hiring for work on home robotics, prepares to open new retail stores and expands its subscription offerings.】

item.title: 扎姆拉齐洛娃称通胀风险阻碍捷克更快降息
item.description: 捷克央行副行长伊娃-扎姆拉齐洛娃（Eva Zamrazilova）表示，捷克央行必须谨慎推进进一步的货币宽松政策，因为持续的通胀风险超过了疲软的经济增长。【原文：The Czech central bank must proceed cautiously with further monetary easing because persistent inflation risks are outweighing sluggish economic growth, according to Vice Governor Eva Zamrazilova.】

item.title: 瑞士选民因经济问题拒绝接受排放限制
item.description: 瑞士选民在全民公决中否决了一套严格的排放限制，驳回了加强气候保护的呼吁，因为他们担心这会阻碍经济发展。【原文：Swiss voters rejected a set of rigid emission limits in a plebiscite, dismissing a call for more climate protection over fears that it would stymie the economy.】

item.title: 日本首相石破茂在首次峰会上展示如何与特朗普合作
item.description: 日本首相石破茂与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普举行了首次首脑会谈，东京方面担心日本可能继加拿大等国之后成为美国盟友的下一个目标。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba went into his first summit meeting with US President Donald Trump amid concerns in Tokyo that Japan could be next in the firing line of US allies after Canada and others.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织与埃塞俄比亚债务重组谈判即将结束
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）表示，埃塞俄比亚在 20 国集团共同框架下的债务重组谈判已接近尾声。【原文：Ethiopia is nearing the end of debt restructuring talks under the Group of 20’s Common Framework, according to International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva.】

item.title: 报告称，越来越多的澳大利亚退休人员难以支付房租
item.description: 一份针对准备就住房和生活费用问题进行选举的立法者的新报告称，越来越多的澳大利亚退休人员因付不起房租而面临无家可归的风险。【原文：A growing number of Australian retirees risk falling into homelessness because they can’t afford to pay rent, said a new report aimed at lawmakers preparing to fight an election on housing and cost-of-living.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 Maaden 公司融资 12.5 亿美元为矿业发展提供资金
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯矿业公司（Saudi Arabian Mining Co.，俗称 Maaden）首次出售伊斯兰债券就筹集了 12.5 亿美元，该公司希望为未来五年的大规模扩张计划提供资金。【原文：Saudi Arabian Mining Co., commonly known as Maaden, has raised $1.25 billion from its debut Islamic bond sale as the company looks to fund a huge expansion program over the next five years.】

item.title: 贝利希望降低借贷成本，但市场另有想法
item.description: 英格兰银行的利率下调并未传导至家庭和政府的借贷成本，这使得英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）更难实现她所承诺的经济增长和修复公共财政。【原文：Bank of England interest-rate cuts are not feeding through to borrowing costs for households and the government, making it harder for Chancellor Rachel Reeves to deliver the economic growth she has promised and repair the public finances.】

item.title: 哪吒 2》10 天票房达 10 亿美元，刷新中国票房纪录
item.description: 哪吒 2》在中国上映 10 天，票房超过 10 亿美元，创下中国电影票房新高。【原文：Ne Zha 2 grossed more than $1 billion in China over its first 10 days in cinemas, setting the country’s new box office high mark.】

item.title: 石场与特朗普遥相呼应：新日铁将投资美国钢铁业
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，新日本钢铁公司将对美国钢铁公司进行投资，而美国钢铁公司仍将是一家美国公司。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said that Nippon Steel Corp. will be investing in United States Steel Corp., which will remain an American company.】

item.title: 节假日消费激增后中国消费通胀回升
item.description: 中国的消费通胀率自 8 月份以来首次加速上升，这很可能是春节假期前后家庭支出激增造成的短暂现象，尽管通货紧缩的压力依然存在。【原文：China’s consumer inflation accelerated for the first time since August, in what’s likely a blip caused by a burst of household spending around the Lunar New Year holiday even as deflationary pressures persist.】

item.title: 新西兰改变 "黄金签证 "以吸引富裕移民
item.description: 新西兰正在简化其所谓的 "黄金签证 "计划，包括取消英语语言要求，以吸引富裕移民，帮助经济复苏。【原文：New Zealand is simplifying its so-called “golden visa” program, including removing an English language requirement, to attract wealthy immigrants and help spark an economic recovery.】

item.title: 特朗普引发的波动让亚洲基金寻找避风港
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在关税问题上的惩罚性举动和频繁的 "翻脸 "给亚洲基金经理们带来了挑战：如何避免在头条新闻驱动的市场中出现任何可能的损失。【原文：Donald Trump’s punishing tariff salvos and frequent flip-flops are laying down a challenge to Asian fund managers: how to avoid any potential wipe-outs in a headline-driven market.】

item.title: 据说 Zamp 首席执行官的离职与业绩分歧有关
item.description: 在穆巴达拉资本（Mubadala Capital）控制这家巴西快餐公司不到一年的时间里，领导层突然发生了转变。【原文：Differences over performance led to Zamp SA parting ways with its chief executive officer, an abrupt leadership shift that comes just shy of a year after Mubadala Capital took control of the Brazilian fast-food company.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔前往国会山之际，通胀已被证明是棘手问题
item.description: 今年年初，美国的通胀率几乎没有出现下降的迹象，而健康的就业增长为经济提供了支撑，这为美联储暂时维持利率不变的立场提供了支持。【原文：US inflation showed scant signs of downward momentum at the start of the year, while healthy job growth undergirded the economy, backing the Federal Reserve’s stance to hold the line on interest rates for now.】

item.title: 连特朗普的关税言论都无法改变债务衍生品的紧张局势
item.description: 即使是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税言论也无法撼动信贷市场，这在一些资金经理和策略师看来是市场过于自满的迹象。【原文：Even US President Donald Trump’s tariff rhetoric can’t rattle credit markets, a sign to some money managers and strategists that the market is too complacent.】

item.title: 激进分子埃利奥特据称将增持陷入困境的石油巨头英国石油公司的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已在英国石油公司（BP Plc）建立了大量的股份，因为这家英国石油巨头正在努力赢回投资者的信心，扭转多年来业绩不佳的局面。【原文：Elliott Investment Management has built a significant stake in BP Plc, according to people familiar with the matter, as the British oil major struggles to win back investor confidence and reverse years of underperformance.】

item.title: 加拿大向美国各州提出反对特朗普恢复征收关税的理由
item.description: 加拿大贸易部长玛丽-吴（Mary Ng）表示，加拿大将继续努力说服特朗普政府放弃其关税计划，部分方法是与美国与北方邻国有重要贸易关系的各州进行接触。【原文：Canada will keep trying to persuade the Trump administration to drop its tariff plans, in part by reaching out to US states that have significant trading relationships with their northern neighbor, trade minister Mary Ng said.】

item.title: Moove 努力控制里约热内卢建筑群内的火灾
item.description: 巴西消防员正在努力控制 Moove 位于里约热内卢 Ilha do Governador 工厂内的大火。【原文：Firefighters in Brazil are working to control a blaze within Moove’s plant in Ilha do Governador in Rio de Janeiro.】

item.title: 塔斯社报道：俄罗斯电信公司称波罗的海电缆受损
item.description: 据塔斯社周六援引电信运营商 PJSC Rostelecom 的消息报道，俄罗斯在波罗的海的一条水下电缆因不明外力撞击而受损。【原文：A Russian underwater cable in the Baltic Sea has been damaged by an unspecified external impact, Tass reported on Saturday, citing the telecommunications provider PJSC Rostelecom.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克说他终究不想收购 TikTok 的美国业务
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他对收购 TikTok 没有兴趣，因为美国出于国家安全考虑，曾试图禁止中国所有者 Bytedance Ltd. 开发流行的社交视频应用程序 TikTok。【原文：Elon Musk said he isn’t interested in buying TikTok, the popular social video app the US has tried to ban over national security concerns with its Chinese owner Bytedance Ltd.】

item.title: 索尼 PlayStation 网络故障影响数以千计的在线游戏玩家
item.description: 索尼集团公司表示，它正在努力解决 PlayStation 网络的一个问题，这个问题导致成千上万的玩家在周六的大部分时间里无法登录或串流游戏。【原文：Sony Group Corp. said it’s working to resolve an issue with its PlayStation Network that has left thousands of players unable to sign on or stream games for most of Saturday.】

item.title: SVP 旗下 Kloeckner Pentaplast 公司达成延长债券期限协议
item.description: 德国包装公司 Kloeckner Pentaplast 达成协议，延长其风险最大的一笔债务的到期日，因为通货膨胀和需求减弱对其业务造成了压力。【原文：German packaging company Kloeckner Pentaplast reached a deal to extend the maturity of its riskiest slice of debt as inflation and waning demand put pressure on its business.】

item.title: 美国重启谈判希望渺茫，伊朗货币暴跌
item.description: 伊朗最高领袖淡化了与美国重启核协议谈判的前景，一天后，伊朗货币跌至新低。【原文：Iran’s currency plunged to a new low a day after the country’s supreme leader downplayed the prospect of renewed negotiations with the US over a nuclear deal.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩任命贝莱德基金经理比萨特为经济部长
item.description: 黎巴嫩任命贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Lebanon appointed BlackRock Inc. money manager Amer Bisat as economy minister, a key figure in a new government that will look to pull the cash-strapped country out of one of the world’s worst financial crises.】

item.title: 雪佛龙称美国原油增长乏力给港口项目蒙上阴影
item.description: 据雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）称，美国石油产量增长放缓，给旨在扩大原油运往海外市场的项目蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：Slowing US oil-production growth is casting a pall over projects intended to expand crude shipments to overseas markets, according to Chevron Corp.】

item.title: 超级碗 14 亿美元投注助推博彩股上涨
item.description: 超级碗周日是美国一年一度的独特经历，充满了夸张的盛况、黄金时间的娱乐、巨星和大量的赌博。【原文：Super Bowl Sunday is a uniquely American annual experience, filled with over-the-top pageantry, prime time entertainment, mega-celebrities, and lots and lots of gambling.】

item.title: 加密货币公司寻找人脉广泛的华盛顿说客
item.description: 越来越多的加密货币公司正在四处聘请关系良好的说客或政策专家，以加强他们在华盛顿的影响力，并与数字资产友好型的新政府保持联系。【原文：A growing number of crypto companies are shopping around to hire well-connected lobbyists or policy experts to bolster their presence in Washington and have a line to the new digital asset-friendly administration.】
